channel.title: Couple of questions
channel.description:
1. How do you find like frames and stuff? i want to make my own special but i want the special bar on screen, i cant find the frame for the bottom of the screen...
2. How do you work the jar command in command prompt? i am making a web client but i cant seem to get it to do it just right. so far i just got an empty jar file made...
3. how do you make npcs agressive? i hate them just standing there its to easy. i want to use the sumoning code from cheezscape to make em folow the person for a second after they are attacked, that i can do im sure, but i dont know how to make them attack people
4. got a glitch maybe, sometimes when a newer player, or a weaker player fights an npc, they cant walk away from it for a while.

item.title: Couple of questions

item.description:
@happy2help wrote:

[quote=“dracar, post:1, topic:58667”]1. How do you find like frames and stuff? i want to make my own special but i want the special bar on screen, i cant find the frame for the bottom of the screen…

  1. How do you work the jar command in command prompt? i am making a web client but i cant seem to get it to do it just right. so far i just got an empty jar file made…

  2. how do you make npcs agressive? i hate them just standing there its to easy. i want to use the sumoning code from cheezscape to make em folow the person for a second after they are attacked, that i can do im sure, but i dont know how to make them attack people

  3. got a glitch maybe, sometimes when a newer player, or a weaker player fights an npc, they cant walk away from it for a while.[/quote]

note to you a “couple” is 2… 4 is not 2… 4 is not a couple.

item.title: Couple of questions
item.dc:creator: @l_Whitney_l l Whitney l
item.description:
@l_Whitney_l wrote:

[quote=“dracar, post:7, topic:58667”]hmm is there an Inarea thing? and i just found htis in npc handler, i think i jsut need to set it up…

AttackPlayer(i); [/quote]

} npcs[i].updateRequired = true; } else if (npcs[i].RandomWalk == false && npcs[i].IsUnderAttack == true) { if(npcs[i].npcType == 1645 || npcs[i].npcType == 509 || npcs[i].npcType == 1241 || npcs[i].npcType == 1246) AttackPlayerMage(i); else AttackPlayer(i); } else if (npcs[i].followingPlayer && npcs[i].followPlayer > 0 && server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].followPlayer] != null) { if(server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].followPlayer].AttackingOn > 0) { int follow = npcs[i].followPlayer; npcs[i].StartKilling = server.playerHandler.players[follow].AttackingOn; npcs[i].RandomWalk = true; npcs[i].IsUnderAttack = true; if(npcs[i].StartKilling > 0) { if(npcs[i].npcType == 1645 || npcs[i].npcType == 509 || npcs[i].npcType == 1241 || npcs[i].npcType == 1246) AttackPlayerMage(i); else AttackPlayer(i); }

Thats what i have, if thats even any where near what your looking at.

Read full topic

item.title: Couple of questions
item.dc:creator: @dracar dracar
item.description:
@dracar wrote:

hmm does this look at all right?

int isInNpcsArea = false

if (absX >= npcs[NPCID].absX-3 && absX <= npcs[NPCID].absX+3 && absY >= npcs[NPCID].absY-3 && absY <= npcs[NPCID].absY+3){
isInNpcArea = true;
}
if (isInNpcArea == true)
{
AttackPlayer(i);
}

hmm what is i, i never cud figure out, but i think thats geting close…[br][size=1]Posted on: February 15, 2007, 12:10:10 AM[/size][hr]oh yea…
6. how do you make the npc face the way u want it to?

im gunna get called retarded again for my questions, but im a perfectionist most of the time and i want to do sumthin on my server but i need all this, i postes so that if someone knows the answer before me, then i dont have to waste my time searching, but i am looking now too… so ne1 know answers?

Read full topic

item.title: Couple of questions
item.dc:creator: @katzcinky katzcinky
item.description:
@katzcinky wrote:

  1. the glitch in number 4 happens on all pk servers to every level player, and idk how to fix. to cut the lgitch just hav the player log out and in

  2. that i also do not know, if you experiment for a while u can probably figure it out, and if/when u do…post a tutorial about it so others can know

  3. in the tutorial section is a tut by Lothy (another genious) about how to find frames and work with cases. u need to use that because frames and cases go hand in hand for button commands like Special attack bars, etc.
